xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/484544-Blood Bath 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xiAJ6AKLWiJy1OhJMcPyYwqDbm2.jpg A doll, awakened, follows a ribbon into an alternate reality where she discovers that which brings her life has the power to destroy her. A visual exploration of self-awareness and internal discovery, Blood Bath shows us life in duality. It is an expression of living as both human and object and asks us to consider brokeness as a gateway to strength. Blood Bath
